definition: three types of waste product, namely: waste water 廢水|废水[fei4 shui3], exhaust gas 廢氣|废气[fei4 qi4], industrial slag 廢渣|废渣[fei4 zha1]
to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: Finally, the treatment methods for the wastes from production were put forward.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了生產吡蟲啉原藥的三廢治理方法。

sentences.english: In addition, the uses of the by-products and the treatment ways of the wastes are suggested.
sentences.chinese: 此外，又提出副產物的利用和三廢治理途徑。
